attributes.comment:
Hello,
I read a proposed ruling on Adjustment of the Immigration and Naturalization
Benefit Application and Petition Fee Schedule. I would really appreciate if you can
a little be reasonable with I-140 and I-485 filing fee because this is a really
enormous increase. All employers are already spending lots of money on H1B
sponsorship every 3 years or every year due to backlog especially on behalf of
Indian / Chinese nationals and on PERM application. With this ruling there will be
an added burden on employers. This would also affect advancement of immigrants.
This is just my honest opinion. I also understand your socio-economic
responsibilities towards the nation but at the same time I would really request you
to be reasonable with filing fee etc..Thank you very much.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Alpesh M. Shah
